### ACAN - Chameleon Tunable Ti-sapphire Laser (Ultra, 80 MHz) for Diagnosis and Repair Services
#### Tender Details

 ###### Solicitation Information
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01020073
* **Solicitation Number**: 01R11-23-C079
* **Publication Date**: January 4, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2023, 3:00 PM CST

#### Contract Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Contact Person**: Zack Flamont, Phone: 639-560-3462, Email: [zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca](mailto:zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca)
* **Location**: Reghin, Saskatchewan, Canada S4P 0M3

#### Service Requirements
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking to contract services from Coherent Canada Inc for diagnosis and repair of one(1) Chameleon Tunable Ti-sapphire Laser (Ultra, 80 MHz) to return the two-photon functionality to a Zeiss LSM710 confocal microscope. The estimated value of the contract is CAD 41,000.00 (including applicable taxes).

#### Contract Period
The contract period is from the date of contract award to March 31, 2023.

#### Notice Type
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

#### Justification for Single Supplier
Coherent Canada Inc is the only supplier capable of performing the contract due to their ownership of the design, architecture, and intellectual property of the Chameleon Tunable Ti-sapphire Laser (Ultra, 80 MHz). They are also the original manufacturer of the equipment and have trained service engineers to perform diagnosis and repair.

#### Statement of Capabilities
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described herein, may submit a statement of capabilities by Email to Zack Flamont at [zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca](mailto:zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca) on or before the closing date of January 12, 2023, at 2:00 pm CST. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

#### Attachments
ACAN documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/docs/.../acan_english.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/docs
